description:
Do you want more confidence, more self-esteem, more mental clarity, more personal power and more success?

Then this course is for you!

In this course you'll learn to develop the ten essential "Mind Powers" which are the fundamentals you need to produce, create and attract more of what you want in your life.

You'll learn to develop your confidence, your self-esteem and your personal power so you can achieve your goals and cultivate a life that contains more of what you want and leads to more happiness and success.

These ten mental skills, mental tools and mental abilities are the same ones I have used to completely change my life. I moved from being frustrated, confused and angry to creating a successful coaching and consulting business that supported me and my family and took me around the world on my schedule. I went from being a college dropout to being offered a teaching position as a professor at a Canadian university.

These are the same mental tools my students all over the globe have used to change their lives for the better. I'm sure they will help you too.

The course includes:

  • Ten main video lessons outlining each main skill;
  • Several short videos to clarify some points;
  • A very powerful creative visualization exercise;
  • Several worksheets to help you organize your thoughts and develop mental clarity;
  • Some short quizzes to help your retention of the main points;
  • The ability to ask questions of the author;
  • Lifetime access to all videos and course materials and to all future updates.
title: Mind Power - Mastering Your Inner Power
